description:
Fenix’s LD line offers some of the best pocketable flashlights, the LD30 is no exception. With a popular 18650 battery, this small light throws 1600 darkness-defying lumens. Dual switches give you momentary activation from the tail-cap, or more conventional activation from the side. You'll wonder how you lived without.

  • 7 lighting modes: 30 lumens (70h), 150 lumens (17h), 350 lumens (5.3h), 800 lumens (1.8h), 1600 lumen turbo (1.25h – useable for 3 minutes due to heat buildup), 1600 lumen strobe and 30 lumen S.O.S. mode
  • Strobe and S.O.S. modes are there if things take turn for the worse
  • Momentary activation from tail-cap switch. Side-mounted switch cycles through modes
  • Versatile 2-position pocket clip to use forwards – like on a hat brim, or backwards – for normal in pocket use
  • Precision engineered optical lens provides a mix of flood and spot lighting
  • Includes 1 rechargeable 18650 battery (charges via micro-USB), can use 2 CR123A batteries for options when traveling (not included)
  • LED power indicator
  • Rugged aluminum body, type-III hard anodizing for extra protection
  • IP68 waterproofing protects your light in any conditions (not built for use underwater)
  • Regulated output maintains constant brightness throughout battery life
  • In the box: LD30, ARB-L18-3400 18650 rechargeable battery, USB charging cable, lanyard, holster, spare O-ring, user manual and warranty card
name: Fenix LD30 Flashlight
